key.name: wave-theme
key.description: Color theme for the waveform visualization bars

key.name: wave-design
key.description: Visual style preset loaded from designs/ directory (modern, glass, minimal, neon, skeuomorphic, neumorphic, retro, brutalist, material)

key.name: wave-size
key.description: Size variant for the waveform bars: thin, medium, or large

key.name: wave-bg-opacity
key.description: Legacy key, replaced by wave-modifier. Background opacity is now per-design.

key.name: wave-modifier
key.description: Controls visual effects intensity such as shadow trail (0=none, 100=maximum)

key.name: wave-position
key.description: Position of the waveform widget on screen

key.name: reaction-time
key.description: How often the waveform bars update in milliseconds

key.name: wave-smoothing
key.description: How smooth the bar animations are (0=jumpy, 100=very smooth)

key.name: wave-sensitivity
key.description: How much the bars react to sound (50=low, 300=very high)

key.name: shortcut-cancel
key.description: Keyboard shortcut to cancel the current recording

key.name: shortcut-realtime
key.description: Keyboard shortcut for realtime voice recording

key.name: shortcut-post-autopaste
key.description: Keyboard shortcut for post-processing with auto-paste

key.name: shortcut-post-router
key.description: Keyboard shortcut for post-processing with router
